name: @wchklaus97hk/claw-core
description: OpenClaw plugin: Terminal Runtime Layer (claw_core) with Agent Teams, multi-bot Telegram setup, PicoClaw integration, direct Cursor Agent invocation, and Cursor agent workspace. Supports 3 specialized bots (artist, assistant, developer) with multi-agent team collaboration, shared task boards, Telegram group coordination, shared_memory, shared_skills, and per-agent workspaces. Linux and macOS only.

scripts.postinstall: chmod +x scripts/claw_core_daemon.sh scripts/postinstall-download-binary.sh 2>/dev/null || true; bash scripts/postinstall-download-binary.sh 2>/dev/null || true; node scripts/postinstall-config-openclaw.cjs 2>/dev/null || true; bash scripts/install-skills-to-openclaw.sh 2>/dev/null || true

author: wchklaus97hk
